channel.title: (old) Flying penises attack in a CNET meeting
channel.description:
edit: noticed that it is old. some stupid site had it on the front page and I had not heard of the story before.
Flying penii attack in a Second Life CNET meeting with the ex governor of virginia.
http://www.somethingawful.com/d/second-life-safari/room-101-vs.php?page=1
<3 griefers

item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

edit: noticed that it is old. some stupid site had it on the front page and I had not heard of the story before.

Flying penii attack in a Second Life CNET meeting with the ex governor of virginia.

somethingawful.com

Something Awful - Room 101 vs. Anshe Chung

Second Life Safari author Petey gives an exclusive report on the activities of virtual terrorist group Room 101, which griefed an Anshe Chung interview by CNET and whose members remain at large.

<3 griefers
